name: OSSerialization
desc: A container for one or more objects, serialized in a binary data format that is suitable for messaging.

items.name: + createFromBytes
items.desc: Allocates an OSSerialization object from the serialized data of a previous serialization.

items.name: + createFromObject
items.desc: Allocates an OSSerialization object with the serialized data of an object.

items.name: - copyObject
items.desc: Obtain the result of the deserialization performed by createFromBytes().

items.name: - finalizeBuffer
items.desc: Obtain the result of the serialization performed by createFromObject().
